header_text: You are walking to work when you hear a sudden noise behind you. When you quickly turn your head to see what it is, a feeling of dizziness hits you, and you begin to worry you will lose control.

elements.text: Noticing these thoughts, you decide that you will be able to cope, and so you keep...
